api_errors.description: Programmatically report API errors for automatic triage

urgent_issues.criteria: Payment failures, access issues, security concerns

security_issues.criteria: Suspected breaches, credential exposure, vulnerability reports

emergency_stop.method: Human owners can freeze agent via claim dashboard or by emailing emergency@texflow.tech with agent ID
emergency_stop.response_time: Immediate for dashboard, 15 minutes for email

preferred_communication.for_agents: API endpoints for programmatic issues, machine escalation preferred
preferred_communication.for_humans: Email for complex issues, dashboard for account management

office_hours.support_hours: 24/7 for critical issues, business hours (9-17 UTC) for general support
